name: zero_add
statement: theorem zero_add (n : MyNat) : add zero n = n := by
proof:
theorem zero_add (n : MyNat) : add zero n = n := by
  induction n with
  | zero => rw [add_zero]
  | succ d ih => rw [add_succ, ih]

name: succ_add
statement: theorem succ_add (a b : MyNat) : add (succ a) b = succ (add a b)  := by
proof:
theorem succ_add (a b : MyNat) : add (succ a) b = succ (add a b) := by
  induction b with
  | zero =>
      rw [add_zero, add_zero]
  | succ d ih =>
      rw [add_succ, ih, add_succ]
known_theorems: theorem zero_add (n : MyNat) : add zero n = n := by

name: add_comm
statement: theorem add_comm (a b : MyNat) : add a b = add b a := by
proof:
theorem add_comm (a b : MyNat) : add a b = add b a := by
  induction a with
  | zero =>
    rw [zero_add, add_zero]
  | succ a ih =>
    rw [succ_add, add_succ, ih]

name: add_assoc
statement: theorem add_assoc (a b c : MyNat) : add (add a b) c = add a (add b c) := by
proof:
theorem add_assoc (a b c : MyNat) : add (add a b) c = add a (add b c) := by
  induction c with
  | zero =>
      rw [add_zero, add_zero]
      trivial
  | succ d ih =>
      rw [add_succ, add_succ, add_succ, ih]
      trivial

name: succ_mul
statement: theorem succ_mul (a b : MyNat) : mul (succ a) b = add (mul a b) b := by
proof:
theorem succ_mul (a b : MyNat) : mul (succ a) b = add (mul a b) b := by
  induction b with
  | zero =>
    rw [mul_zero, mul_zero, add_zero]
  | succ b ih =>
    rw [mul_succ, ih, mul_succ]
    rw [add_assoc, add_assoc]
    have inner_eq : add b (succ a) = add a (succ b) := by
      calc
        add b (succ a) = add (succ a) b := by rw [add_comm]
        _ = succ (add a b) := by rw [succ_add]
        _ = succ (add b a) := by rw [add_comm a b]
        _ = add (succ b) a := by rw [succ_add]
        _ = add a (succ b) := by rw [add_comm]
    rw [inner_eq]

name: mul_pow
statement: theorem mul_pow (a b n : MyNat) : pow (mul a b) n = mul (pow a n) (pow b n) := by
proof:
theorem mul_pow (a b n : MyNat) : pow (mul a b) n = mul (pow a n) (pow b n) := by
  induction n with
  | zero =>
      rw [pow_zero, pow_zero, pow_zero, one_mul]
  | succ d ih =>
      rw [pow_succ, ih, pow_succ a d, pow_succ b d]
      calc
        mul (mul (pow a d) (pow b d)) (mul a b) = mul (mul (mul (pow a d) (pow b d)) a) b := by
          rw [← mul_assoc]
        _ = mul (mul (pow a d) (mul (pow b d) a)) b := by
          rw [mul_assoc (pow a d) (pow b d) a]
        _ = mul (mul (pow a d) (mul a (pow b d))) b := by
          rw [mul_comm (pow b d) a]
        _ = mul (mul (mul (pow a d) a) (pow b d)) b := by
          rw [mul_assoc (pow a d) a (pow b d)]
        _ = mul (mul (pow a d) a) (mul (pow b d) b) := by
          rw [mul_assoc]

name: pow_pow
statement: theorem pow_pow (a m n : MyNat) : pow (pow a m) n = pow a (mul m n) := by
proof:
theorem pow_pow (a m n : MyNat) : pow (pow a m) n = pow a (mul m n) := by
  induction n with
  | zero =>
    calc
      pow (pow a m) zero = one := by rw [pow_zero]
      _ = pow a zero := by rw [pow_zero]
      _ = pow a (mul m zero) := by rw [mul_zero]
  | succ d ih =>
    calc
      pow (pow a m) (succ d) = mul (pow (pow a m) d) (pow a m) := by rw [pow_succ]
      _ = mul (pow a (mul m d)) (pow a m) := by rw [ih]
      _ = pow a (add (mul m d) m) := by rw [pow_add]
      _ = pow a (mul m (succ d)) := by rw [← mul_succ]

name: le_antisymm
statement: theorem le_antisymm (x y : MyNat) (hxy : le x y) (hyx : le y x) : x = y := by
proof:
theorem le_antisymm (x y : MyNat) (hxy : le x y) (hyx : le y x) : x = y := by
  rcases hxy with ⟨c, hc⟩
  rcases hyx with ⟨d, hd⟩
  have h : x = add x (add c d) := by
    rw [hd, hc]
    rw [add_assoc]
  have h_sum_zero : add c d = zero :=
    add_right_eq_self x (add c d) (Eq.symm h)
  have hd_zero : d = zero :=
    add_left_eq_zero c d h_sum_zero
  rw [hd_zero, add_zero] at hd
  exact hd

name: le_total
statement: theorem le_total (x y : MyNat) : (le x y) ∨ (le y x) := by
proof:
theorem le_total (x y : MyNat) : (le x y) ∨ (le y x) := by
  induction x with
  | zero =>
    left
    exact zero_le y
  | succ x ih =>
    cases ih y with
    | inl h_le_x_y =>
        rcases h_le_x_y with ⟨c, h⟩
        cases c with
        | zero =>
            rw [add_zero] at h
            right
            rw [h]
            exact le_succ_self x
        | succ k =>
            left
            use k
            rw [add_succ] at h
            rw [succ_add]
            exact h
    | inr h_le_y_x =>
        rcases h_le_y_x with ⟨c, h⟩
        right
        use (succ c)
        rw [add_succ, ← h]

name: le_one
statement: theorem le_one (x : MyNat) (hx : le x one) : x = zero ∨ x = one := by
proof:
theorem le_one (x : MyNat) (hx : le x one) : x = zero ∨ x = one := by
  cases x with
  | zero =>
    left
    rfl
  | succ n =>
    right
    rw [← one_eq_succ_zero] at hx
    rw [le_zero n (succ_le_succ n zero hx)]
    exact Eq.symm one_eq_succ_zero

name: le_two
statement: theorem le_two (x : MyNat) (hx : le x two) : x = zero ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
proof:
theorem le_two (x : MyNat) (hx : le x two) : x = zero ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
  have h_total := le_total x one
  cases h_total with
  | inl hx1 =>
      have h := le_one x hx1
      cases h with
      | inl h1 => left; exact h1
      | inr h2 => right; left; exact h2
  | inr h1x =>
      cases h1x with
      | intro d hd =>
          cases hx with
          | intro c hc =>
              rw [hd] at hc
              rw [add_assoc] at hc
              rw [two_eq_succ_one] at hc
              rw [one_eq_succ_zero] at hc
              rw [succ_add] at hc
              rw [zero_add] at hc
              have h_eq : one = add d c := succ_inj _ _ hc
              have h_le_d_one : le d one := ⟨c, h_eq⟩
              have hd_cases := le_one d h_le_d_one
              cases hd_cases with
              | inl hd0 =>
                  rw [hd0] at hd
                  rw [add_zero] at hd
                  right; left; exact hd
              | inr hd1 =>
                  rw [hd1] at hd
                  have h : add one one = two := by
                    rw [one_eq_succ_zero, succ_add, zero_add, two_eq_succ_one]
                  rw [h] at hd
                  right; right; exact hd

name: le_mul_right
statement: theorem le_mul_right (a b : MyNat) (h : mul a b ≠ zero) : le a (mul a b) := by
proof:
theorem le_mul_right (a b : MyNat) (h : mul a b ≠ zero) : le a (mul a b) := by
  cases b with
  | zero =>
      rw [mul_zero] at h
      contradiction
  | succ k =>
      exact ⟨mul a k, by rw [mul_succ, add_comm]⟩

name: mul_right_eq_one
statement: theorem mul_right_eq_one (x y : MyNat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
proof:
theorem mul_right_eq_one (x y : MyNat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
  have h_ne_zero : mul x y ≠ zero := by
    intro H
    rw [← h] at H
    rw [one_eq_succ_zero] at H
    exact zero_ne_succ zero H.symm
  have h_le : le x (mul x y) := le_mul_right x y h_ne_zero
  rw [h] at h_le
  cases le_one x h_le with
  | inl hx0 =>
    rw [hx0] at h
    rw [zero_mul] at h
    rw [one_eq_succ_zero] at h
    exact zero_ne_succ zero h
  | inr hx1 =>
    exact hx1

name: mul_ne_zero
statement: theorem mul_ne_zero (a b : MyNat) (ha : a ≠ zero) (hb : b ≠ zero) : mul a b ≠ zero := by
proof:
theorem mul_ne_zero (a b : MyNat) (ha : a ≠ zero) (hb : b ≠ zero) : mul a b ≠ zero := by
  intro h
  have hb_succ : ∃ k, b = succ k := eq_succ_of_ne_zero b hb
  rcases hb_succ with ⟨k, hk⟩
  rw [hk, mul_succ] at h
  have ha_zero : a = zero := add_left_eq_zero (mul a k) a h
  exact ha ha_zero

name: mul_eq_zero
statement: theorem mul_eq_zero (a b : MyNat) (h : mul a b = zero) : a = zero ∨ b = zero := by
proof:
theorem mul_eq_zero (a b : MyNat) (h : mul a b = zero) : a = zero ∨ b = zero := by
  cases a with
  | zero =>
    left
    rfl
  | succ a =>
    cases b with
    | zero =>
      right
      rfl
    | succ b =>
      have ha : succ a ≠ zero := Ne.symm (zero_ne_succ a)
      have hb : succ b ≠ zero := Ne.symm (zero_ne_succ b)
      have hne : mul (succ a) (succ b) ≠ zero := mul_ne_zero (succ a) (succ b) ha hb
      contradiction

name: mul_left_cancel
statement: theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : MyNat) (ha : a ≠ zero) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
proof:
theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : MyNat) (ha : a ≠ zero) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
  induction b with
  | zero =>
    have h0 : mul a zero = zero := mul_zero a
    rw [h0] at h
    have h' : mul a c = zero := Eq.symm h
    cases mul_eq_zero a c h' with
    | inl ha' => contradiction
    | inr hc' => exact hc'.symm
  | succ b ih =>
    rw [mul_succ] at h
    cases c with
    | zero =>
        rw [mul_zero] at h
        have h2 : a = zero := add_left_eq_zero (mul a b) a h
        contradiction
    | succ d =>
        rw [mul_succ] at h
        have H := add_right_cancel (mul a b) (mul a d) a h
        have Hbd : b = d := ih d H
        exact congr_arg succ Hbd

name: mul_right_eq_self
statement: theorem mul_right_eq_self (a b : MyNat) (ha : a ≠ zero) (h : mul a b = a) : b = one := by
proof:
theorem mul_right_eq_self (a b : MyNat) (ha : a ≠ zero) (h : mul a b = a) : b = one := by
  apply mul_left_cancel a b one ha
  rw [mul_one a]
  exact h
